name: HER
headline: HER helps lesbian, bisexual and queer people meet each other
description:
HER is here to connect womxn and queer people.

Our dating app helps LGBTQ+ folks express their identity fully and unequivocally to meet someone for love, lust or anything in between. 
Our communities connect people to each other socially around interests and identity. Group chats around what's important to you as well as listings of LGBTQ+ evens taking place in your area. 

HER also hosts events in 12 cities across the world, helping queer womxn meet in person. Our parties are typically 300-600 people per event and we host 4 per month.

# The Sapphic Dating App
##  Lesbian Dating and LGBTQIA+ Connections
Join a safe space where queer women, nonbinary and trans sapphics come to meet, chat and flirt, all with the goal of finding their person. 
_**Step into the sapphic utopia of your dreams!**_ Build authentic LGBTQIA+ connections and meet your forever people. 
Created by and for queer folks, HER takes the guesswork out of queer and lesbian dating so you can focus on finding the one. 
[Find My People](http://weareher.com/<https:/links.weareher.com/eGYI5cJldvb>)
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### 15+ million active members
With no shortage of sapphic people, your perfect match awaits 
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### 4.5 stars on the App Store
Apple Editor’s Choice 2019 - 2023 
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### Empowering communities
Join one of our vibrant 35+ communities 
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### Queers and lesbians near you
Connect safely with like-minded friends & lovers in your area 
### We created a relationship platform that we actually enjoy being on
## The #1 LGBTQIA+ Dating App
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
HER was the first app to launch that exclusively focussed on the needs of queer, bisexual and lesbian dating. While there were over 40 apps for other sexualities, not a single dating app existed for LGBTQ+ women and non-binary people until there was HER. Eight years later, HER has made [over 300 million lesbian matches](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/her-reaches-300-million-matches-and-counting/>), thousands of queer marriages and hundreds of lil babies. 
[HER](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/about/>) is the world’s largest (and most iconic) dating and community-building platform for lesbian, bisexual, queer women and gender-non-conforming icons worldwide. Whilst most heteronormative apps focus on the experience of cis men (the people those apps make their money from), **HER is designed** to focus exclusively on the**needs of queer women, non-binary and trans people.**
We have features to express the unique parts of sapphic culture that mean the most to you and your identity. We have community spaces to connect with other people like you. And we create a safe space amongst other sapphics to be yourself and focus on what’s important to you while finding your partner. 
With **over 15 million users in more than 114 countries** , you can absolutely bet that your perfect match — or perfect matches — are only a few clicks away. So, whether you’re looking for a partner or hoping to make new friends, HER has something for you. 
[Find My Person Today ](http://weareher.com/<https:/links.weareher.com/eGYI5cJldvb>)
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### Let your most authentic self shine through
## HER’s Most Unique Features
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
HER cares, and I mean _really_ cares. Our unique in-app features reflect that. Our queer and lesbian dating app allows you to **customize every little aspect of your dating profile** so the most authentic version of yourself can shine brightly from day one. 
Unlike the hetero apps, HER allows you to easily add your pronouns, gender identity, sexual orientation, and a litany of other fun facts and pins to your profile that make you, well, _you!_
We go a step further than just giving you the option to list your basic lifestyle, like whether you’re sober, religious, or want kids someday. We also allow you to add [Pride Pins](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/celebrating-love-with-new-pride-pins/>) to your profile so you can easily let potential matches know whether you’re QPOC, T4T, chapstick or masc lesbians, intersex, and more. You can even add things to your profile, like your love language, or include one (or a few) of our free [Political Pride Pins](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/dating-with-purpose-political-pins/>) to filter your feed according to the nitty-gritty social issues you care about the most! 
The best part? **All of our****core features are free** and will remain free. Like, forever. That said, if you’re ever looking to upgrade your experience and take it to the next level, HER Premium offers one-of-a-kind features like incognito mode, rewinding profiles you accidentally swiped left on, seeing everyone who’s viewed you, and unlimited swipes. 
Join us today and discover what awaits you on the App Store or the Play Store.
[Download HER ](http://weareher.com/<https:/links.weareher.com/eGYI5cJldvb>)
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)

![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)

![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)

## Download HER
[Find my people](http://weareher.com/<https:/links.weareher.com/eGYI5cJldvb>)
### Our trust and safety team ensures that HER remains a safe space
## Safe Lesbian & LGBTQIA+ Dating
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
HER has become the most prominent player in the queer dating app scene, so you can rest assured that this platform and team are looking out for your unique queer needs. With more people comes great responsibility and our Trust and Safety team works around the clock to improve [HER’s](http://weareher.com/<https:/support.weareher.com/hc/en-us/sections/5267774911380-My-Safety-Reporting>) safety measures and ensure the safety and well-being of our community. 
We have a world-class Trust and Safety team, **including moderators** who ensure everyone on HER is treated with respect. On top of this, users are verified and authenticated on the app by connecting their profiles with existing social media accounts.
If you ever come across something that just isn’t sitting quite right, **flag or report** it so that our team can assess the situation and remove any scammers, transphobes, or fake celebrity profiles from the app.
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
HER dating app FAQ
##  Is the HER app safe? 
Being a queer person comes with its own set of personal considerations, and we understand that. That’s why we take your safety seriously at HER and are committed to ensuring that you feel safe and respected in our community. 
Gone are the days of endlessly scrolling through lesbian dating sites that aren’t actually built for the sapphic community.
With HER, you’re in complete control of your profile and search preferences, and we encourage our users to verify their profiles and filter for other verified profiles to ensure authenticity and avoid fake profiles. If you prefer, you can enable incognito mode so you can browse and engage with users without revealing your identity until you’re ready. 
You can trust us to do all we can to keep you safe and make your HER experience positive. In addition, we provide [resources](http://weareher.com/<https:/support.weareher.com/hc/en-us/articles/15208319874068-Meeting-Up-Maintaining-Safety>) to help you navigate the platform safely.
##  What countries is HER available in? 
We are available in 125+ countries and locally in English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. [See all the countries we’re in](http://weareher.com/<https:/support.weareher.com/hc/en-us/articles/6969610173460-What-Countries-Is-HER-Available-In>).
##  Is the HER app free? 
HER is the most loved lesbian dating app for finding your person or community, and we’re proud to offer all our core features totally free of charge. Yes, you don’t have to pay to be on and use the app.
The free version of the app allows you to access everything you need to connect with others, including adding friends, viewing profiles, starting chats, viewing events, and joining communities.
##  How does the HER premium subscription work? 
With HER Premium, finding friends and matches is even easier. You can take advantage of an ad-free experience, see who’s online in real-time, filter by sexuality, use the app in incognito mode (without exposing your identity), view who has liked you, and many other [cool features](http://weareher.com/<https:/support.weareher.com/hc/en-us/articles/5270063673876-What-is-HER-Premium>).
Getting started is easy – simply subscribe to HER Premium, and you’ll immediately have access to all its amazing features until your subscription expires at the end of its duration. 
##  How can I update my gender identity on my profile? 
It’s not just about expressing who you are; **it also helps others understand and respect you better**. By sharing your gender identity, you can avoid assumptions and misgendering that can make conversations hurtful and uncomfortable. That’s why our team has created a [detailed guide](http://weareher.com/<https:/support.weareher.com/hc/en-us/articles/15464131311380-How-can-I-update-my-Gender-Identity-on-my-profile>) on updating your gender identity on your HER profile.
It’s all about creating a welcoming and accepting community where everyone can be themselves without judgment and learn more about you and how you live. 
##  Can I use HER to make friends? 
HER isn’t just a dating app — it’s also a queer and lesbian community app and a fantastic tool for discovering new friends who share your interests. So, if you’re looking for an exciting way to expand your social circle, look no further than HER. 
We offer an ‘Add Friend’ option on profiles so you can connect with like-minded individuals and build your own community of people. Whether you’re new to a city or just looking to explore your local queer scene, our app can help you find the best events and activities nearby. With a dedicated community section, you can engage in conversations on varied topics, find your niche, and make new friends. 
So why wait? Join HER today and start connecting with amazing individuals from all walks of life!
Sapphic dating FAQ
##  What is the girl version of Grindr? 
There’s a bit of a Grindr vibe for finding amazing women on HER, but **we focus on fostering quality connections** , not just quick hookups. 
HER goes beyond just swiping, though. It’s a safe space to find iconic **queer women, non-binary and trans people** who are down for anything, from coffee dates to dance floor domination. 
Think of us as your modern-day Lesbos (that 6th century BC Greek island paradise), a place where sapphics gathered to celebrate art, music, and each other. Here at HER, you can match with someone who shares your passions and is looking for something real.
##  How can I find a lesbian partner? 
Looking for a lesbian partner can be an exciting but daunting journey. It can take you down different paths, and each experience is unique. But if you’re searching for a welcoming and inclusive space tailored to the LGBTQ+ community, HER is an excellent starting point. 
HER is a dedicated platform designed for lesbian, bi, queer, and other marginalized genders. It fosters a supportive environment where authenticity thrives, making connecting with like-minded individuals who share similar experiences and interests easier. HER offers personalized matching and community events, allowing you to meet potential partners in a safe and inclusive space. 
So, if you’re wondering where to find a lesbian partner, HER is the perfect place to begin your search.
##  What should you do on a first date? 
First dates can be fun! We know it can be nerve-wracking to meet someone new, but that first spark can be incredibly powerful. That’s why we’ve got tips and conversation starters like [funny first date questions](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/funny-first-date-questions/>) to break the ice. 
Feeling a little awkward? It happens to the best of us! Just relax, be yourself, and focus on getting to know the other person. Ask questions about their hobbies, interests, and what they’re looking for in a partner. You might be surprised at what you have in common!
##  What is the 3-month rule for dating? 
The “three-month rule” is a debatable idea that says you shouldn’t “fall in love” until 3 months. But really, every relationship moves at its own pace! We have a great article on [dating for three months](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/dating-for-three-months/>) to help you navigate those early stages.
At HER, we believe in open communication and following your heart. Talk to each other about what you’re looking for in a relationship and see if you’re on the same page. If you and your date click and want to define the relationship, go for it! There’s no reason to wait.
##  Any advice on having lesbian sex for the first time? 
Totally get the jitters! We’ve got you covered. Whether you’re nervous or excited, it’s completely normal. HER is a safe space where you can explore your feelings and desires at your own pace. 
We know sex can be a lot to think about, so we’ve created a guide to [first-time lesbian experiences](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/first-time-lesbian-experience/>) packed with information and tips for lesbian couples. 
Talk openly and honestly with your partner about your desires, boundaries, and what feels good for you. The more you communicate, the more comfortable and relaxed you’ll feel, allowing you to enjoy the moment and create a truly intimate connection.
## Sapphic topics
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### Delve into the sapphic world
You may have heard the term  _sapphic_ floating around or even seen the sapphic flag, but are you unsure what that means?
[Sapphic meaning and flag](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/sapphic-meaning-lesbian-slang-glossary/>)
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### Topping, bottoming and switching: Which are you and what are you looking for?
They can refer to someone’s sexual preferences, level of dominance, role in their relationships, or all of the above.
[Top, bottom or switch?](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/top-bottom-and-switch-which-are-you-and-what-are-you-looking-for/>)
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### Lesbian or bi? Things to know if you're questioning
For many queer people, figuring out one’s sexuality is not always an easy process. Sexuality is complex and can often get confusing (and even downright overwhelming!). We break down what to pay attention to if you’re questioning.
[Am I lesbian or bi?](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/am-i-bisexual-or-lesbian/>)
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### All about transgender dating
Learn more about the most common questions related to transgender dating and how to make it easier and more respectful for everyone.
[Trans | TS dating](http://weareher.com/<https:/weareher.com/trans-dating/>)

# The Sapphic Dating App
##  Lesbian Dating and LGBTQIA+ Connections
Join a safe space where queer women, nonbinary and trans sapphics come to meet, chat and flirt, all with the goal of finding their person. 
_**Step into the sapphic utopia of your dreams!**_ Build authentic LGBTQIA+ connections and meet your forever people. 
Created by and for queer folks, HER takes the guesswork out of queer and lesbian dating so you can focus on finding the one. 
Find My People⟨24⟩
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### 15+ million active members
With no shortage of sapphic people, your perfect match awaits

### We created a relationship platform that we actually enjoy being on
## The #1 LGBTQIA+ Dating App
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
HER was the first app to launch that exclusively focussed on the needs of queer, bisexual and lesbian dating. While there were over 40 apps for other sexualities, not a single dating app existed for LGBTQ+ women and non-binary people until there was HER. Eight years later, HER has made over 300 million lesbian matches⟨25⟩, thousands of queer marriages and hundreds of lil babies. 
HER⟨5⟩ is the world’s largest (and most iconic) dating and community-building platform for lesbian, bisexual, queer women and gender-non-conforming icons worldwide. Whilst most heteronormative apps focus on the experience of cis men (the people those apps make their money from), **HER is designed** to focus exclusively on the**needs of queer women, non-binary and trans people.**
We have features to express the unique parts of sapphic culture that mean the most to you and your identity. We have community spaces to connect with other people like you. And we create a safe space amongst other sapphics to be yourself and focus on what’s important to you while finding your partner. 
With **over 15 million users in more than 114 countries** , you can absolutely bet that your perfect match — or perfect matches — are only a few clicks away. So, whether you’re looking for a partner or hoping to make new friends, HER has something for you. 
Find My Person Today ⟨24⟩
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### Let your most authentic self shine through
## HER’s Most Unique Features
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
HER cares, and I mean _really_ cares. Our unique in-app features reflect that. Our queer and lesbian dating app allows you to **customize every little aspect of your dating profile** so the most authentic version of yourself can shine brightly from day one. 
Unlike the hetero apps, HER allows you to easily add your pronouns, gender identity, sexual orientation, and a litany of other fun facts and pins to your profile that make you, well, _you!_
We go a step further than just giving you the option to list your basic lifestyle, like whether you’re sober, religious, or want kids someday. We also allow you to add Pride Pins⟨26⟩ to your profile so you can easily let potential matches know whether you’re QPOC, T4T, chapstick or masc lesbians, intersex, and more. You can even add things to your profile, like your love language, or include one (or a few) of our free Political Pride Pins⟨27⟩ to filter your feed according to the nitty-gritty social issues you care about the most! 
The best part? **All of our****core features are free** and will remain free. Like, forever. That said, if you’re ever looking to upgrade your experience and take it to the next level, HER Premium offers one-of-a-kind features like incognito mode, rewinding profiles you accidentally swiped left on, seeing everyone who’s viewed you, and unlimited swipes. 
Join us today and discover what awaits you on the App Store or the Play Store.

### Our trust and safety team ensures that HER remains a safe space
## Safe Lesbian & LGBTQIA+ Dating
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
HER has become the most prominent player in the queer dating app scene, so you can rest assured that this platform and team are looking out for your unique queer needs. With more people comes great responsibility and our Trust and Safety team works around the clock to improve HER’s⟨28⟩ safety measures and ensure the safety and well-being of our community. 
We have a world-class Trust and Safety team, **including moderators** who ensure everyone on HER is treated with respect. On top of this, users are verified and authenticated on the app by connecting their profiles with existing social media accounts.
If you ever come across something that just isn’t sitting quite right, **flag or report** it so that our team can assess the situation and remove any scammers, transphobes, or fake celebrity profiles from the app.
![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
HER dating app FAQ
##  Is the HER app safe? 
Being a queer person comes with its own set of personal considerations, and we understand that. That’s why we take your safety seriously at HER and are committed to ensuring that you feel safe and respected in our community. 
Gone are the days of endlessly scrolling through lesbian dating sites that aren’t actually built for the sapphic community.
With HER, you’re in complete control of your profile and search preferences, and we encourage our users to verify their profiles and filter for other verified profiles to ensure authenticity and avoid fake profiles. If you prefer, you can enable incognito mode so you can browse and engage with users without revealing your identity until you’re ready. 
You can trust us to do all we can to keep you safe and make your HER experience positive. In addition, we provide resources⟨29⟩ to help you navigate the platform safely.
##  What countries is HER available in? 
We are available in 125+ countries and locally in English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. See all the countries we’re in⟨30⟩.
##  Is the HER app free? 
HER is the most loved lesbian dating app for finding your person or community, and we’re proud to offer all our core features totally free of charge. Yes, you don’t have to pay to be on and use the app.
The free version of the app allows you to access everything you need to connect with others, including adding friends, viewing profiles, starting chats, viewing events, and joining communities.
##  How does the HER premium subscription work? 
With HER Premium, finding friends and matches is even easier. You can take advantage of an ad-free experience, see who’s online in real-time, filter by sexuality, use the app in incognito mode (without exposing your identity), view who has liked you, and many other cool features⟨31⟩.
Getting started is easy – simply subscribe to HER Premium, and you’ll immediately have access to all its amazing features until your subscription expires at the end of its duration. 
##  How can I update my gender identity on my profile? 
It’s not just about expressing who you are; **it also helps others understand and respect you better**. By sharing your gender identity, you can avoid assumptions and misgendering that can make conversations hurtful and uncomfortable. That’s why our team has created a detailed guide⟨32⟩ on updating your gender identity on your HER profile.
It’s all about creating a welcoming and accepting community where everyone can be themselves without judgment and learn more about you and how you live. 
##  Can I use HER to make friends? 
HER isn’t just a dating app — it’s also a queer and lesbian community app and a fantastic tool for discovering new friends who share your interests. So, if you’re looking for an exciting way to expand your social circle, look no further than HER. 
We offer an ‘Add Friend’ option on profiles so you can connect with like-minded individuals and build your own community of people. Whether you’re new to a city or just looking to explore your local queer scene, our app can help you find the best events and activities nearby. With a dedicated community section, you can engage in conversations on varied topics, find your niche, and make new friends. 
So why wait? Join HER today and start connecting with amazing individuals from all walks of life!
Sapphic dating FAQ
##  What is the girl version of Grindr? 
There’s a bit of a Grindr vibe for finding amazing women on HER, but **we focus on fostering quality connections** , not just quick hookups. 
HER goes beyond just swiping, though. It’s a safe space to find iconic **queer women, non-binary and trans people** who are down for anything, from coffee dates to dance floor domination. 
Think of us as your modern-day Lesbos (that 6th century BC Greek island paradise), a place where sapphics gathered to celebrate art, music, and each other. Here at HER, you can match with someone who shares your passions and is looking for something real.
##  How can I find a lesbian partner? 
Looking for a lesbian partner can be an exciting but daunting journey. It can take you down different paths, and each experience is unique. But if you’re searching for a welcoming and inclusive space tailored to the LGBTQ+ community, HER is an excellent starting point. 
HER is a dedicated platform designed for lesbian, bi, queer, and other marginalized genders. It fosters a supportive environment where authenticity thrives, making connecting with like-minded individuals who share similar experiences and interests easier. HER offers personalized matching and community events, allowing you to meet potential partners in a safe and inclusive space. 
So, if you’re wondering where to find a lesbian partner, HER is the perfect place to begin your search.
##  What should you do on a first date? 
First dates can be fun! We know it can be nerve-wracking to meet someone new, but that first spark can be incredibly powerful. That’s why we’ve got tips and conversation starters like funny first date questions⟨33⟩ to break the ice. 
Feeling a little awkward? It happens to the best of us! Just relax, be yourself, and focus on getting to know the other person. Ask questions about their hobbies, interests, and what they’re looking for in a partner. You might be surprised at what you have in common!
##  What is the 3-month rule for dating? 
The “three-month rule” is a debatable idea that says you shouldn’t “fall in love” until 3 months. But really, every relationship moves at its own pace! We have a great article on dating for three months⟨34⟩ to help you navigate those early stages.
At HER, we believe in open communication and following your heart. Talk to each other about what you’re looking for in a relationship and see if you’re on the same page. If you and your date click and want to define the relationship, go for it! There’s no reason to wait.
##  Any advice on having lesbian sex for the first time? 
Totally get the jitters! We’ve got you covered. Whether you’re nervous or excited, it’s completely normal. HER is a safe space where you can explore your feelings and desires at your own pace. 
We know sex can be a lot to think about, so we’ve created a guide to first-time lesbian experiences⟨35⟩ packed with information and tips for lesbian couples. 
Talk openly and honestly with your partner about your desires, boundaries, and what feels good for you. The more you communicate, the more comfortable and relaxed you’ll feel, allowing you to enjoy the moment and create a truly intimate connection.
## Sapphic topics

They can refer to someone’s sexual preferences, level of dominance, role in their relationships, or all of the above.

![](http://weareher.com/wp-content/uploads/blank.png)
### Lesbian or bi? Things to know if you're questioning
For many queer people, figuring out one’s sexuality is not always an easy process. Sexuality is complex and can often get confusing (and even downright overwhelming!). We break down what to pay attention to if you’re questioning.
Am I lesbian or bi?⟨38⟩

generated_description:
HER is a vibrant dating app focused exclusively on the needs of lesbian, bisexual, and queer people, making it a game-changer in the LGBTQ+ dating landscape. Founded in 2013 and hailed as part of Y Combinator's S15 batch, the platform serves as a welcoming space where over 15 million users connect, socialize, and build relationships.

The app's mission, simply put, is to help queer individuals meet one another—whether it’s for love, lust, or friendship. HER isn’t just a dating service; it's a community that facilitates expression and connection around shared interests and identities. It features group chats, and resources, and also highlights local LGBTQ+ events, fostering a sense of belonging among its users.

HER organizes events in 12 cities worldwide, hosting parties that draw between 300-600 attendees. This commitment to real-world connections adds an exciting dimension to the app, allowing users to mingle and form bonds beyond the screen.

Headquartered in San Francisco with a tight-knit team of 10, HER stands out not only for its focus on inclusivity but also for its user-friendly features. The app allows users to showcase their authentic selves through customizable profiles, complete with pronouns, sexual orientation, and unique identifiers that resonate with the queer community. This thorough approach to identity helps create deeper connections amongst users.

Although the core app is free forever, a premium version offers added features, including incognito browsing and the ability to see who has viewed your profile. Safety is paramount at HER; their Trust and Safety team actively moderates and ensures that the app remains a respectful space for everyone.

With events, vibrant community features, and a commitment to diversity, HER doesn't just connect people— it cultivates a rich community of support and understanding. Whether you're looking for love, friendship, or simply a space where you can be you, HER has something for everyone. 

If you're part of the LGBTQ+ community or just looking to expand your social circle, HER is definitely worth checking out. You can find it at [weareher.com](http://weareher.com).
